patthana16.80:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana16.80:1.1_1: nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana16.80:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.80:2.1_1: nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
